project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up project structure and requirements
Implement API integration to fetch weather data
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Develop the command-line interface to input the city name
Display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for API integration and data parsing
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
